name: Ghost Hunter (DevForFun)
description:
Getting in a huge mansion, there's a rumour that many people died here. You're the only person who can see those soul and ghost in this house, use your weapon to exorcise the ghost, and salvation those souls.

Control: 

- WASD to move

- Leftmouse to shoot

- F to toggle flashlight

Tips: To know when the ghost come, listen carefully to the sound around you.
